plot: Caillou and Leo want to play hockey and are disappointed when they arrive at the rink to find Sarah and Clementine playing "ringette". Caillou and his family are supposed to be enjoying a nice day at the beach, but it's cloudy and rainy. Mommy takes Caillou and Clementine to an indoor rock climbing wall, but Caillou doesn't want to give it a try—Anonymous
